[[Image:The Silmarillion Desk Calendar 1979.jpg|thumb]]

'''The Silmarillion Desk Calendar 1979''' was produced by [[Ballantine Books]] with illustrations by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and coloration by [[H.E. Riddett]].

* ISBN 0-345-27817-8
* Dimensions: 6.5 x 9 inches
* Plastic comb-bound on side
* Cardboard cover
